mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer(customer_id, customer_pw, customer_name, customer_nickname, customer_address_num, customer_phone, customer_address, customer_customer_seq) VALUES (#{customer_id},#{customer_pw},#{customer_name},#{customer_nickname}, #{customer_address_num}, #{customer_phone}, #{customer_address}, #{customer_customer_seq})
mapper.select: SELECT customer_seq FROM customer WHERE customer_nickname = #{customer_nickname};
